data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Aalbu, Rolf L., Wirth, Christopher C. (2019): The Status of Triorophus punctatus LeConte (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae: Pimeliinae: Edrotini). Zootaxa 4604 (1): 198-200, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4604.1.11
